description: This file defines an AppTheme class that provides a customized Flutter theme (light theme) for a mobile application, including color schemes, text styles, app bar, buttons, and card styles.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class that provides a static method to generate a customized light theme for the Flutter app.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: A static getter that returns a ThemeData object configured with specific colors, text styles, and component themes to ensure a consistent UI appearance based on the Ocean Professional style guide.
